name: UWD - You Will Die!
description:
Game in which you have to survive as long as possible by killing hordes of zombies. Zombies drop bullets for weapons and money or gold to unlock new abilities.
In this game, you'll be able to use up to 4 different weapons to stay alive as long as you can while hours of zombies will appear from time to time making your life more difficult. Collecting money and gold, you can use buing skills to kill more easily or have protection in the game.
Currently the game has 3 maps and a gameplay mode, waves.
Soon we will be making available more weapons, skills, new types of zombies and maps in addition to new modes, with unlimited ammo and more zombies and another coop mode to play with your friends.
